title: Drawing, "The Triumph of Bacchus and Ceres", 1812
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash on light brown laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen:  Bacco Cerere loro trionfo in Tebe; in graphite: sopra il palco de Sovrano 2
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Pageant directed toward right. In right background, temple shown with curtains in intercolumns.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The Triumph of Bacchus and Ceres", 1812.
1812. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash on light brown laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3281.
